name: get_imbuements_for_lich_shroud_death_protection
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tibia_items.
Tool description: this API will helps you find tibia items princes around the worlds

All endpoints to get items values, this is all we try to get on day.

Discord Channel for talk.

API description: This enpoint will get all imbuement for type Lich Shroud

Lich Shroud (Death Protection)
Flask of Embalming Fluid 
Gloom Wolf Fur 
Mystical Hourglass

world.description: The name of the Tibia world for which to fetch the imbuements.
